languages.text: "Да... если их не затронула скверна. Надеюсь, когда ты будешь решать судьбу этого мира и его обитателей, ты задумаешься о том, что среди этих несчастных есть и те, кто избежал касания Хаоса".

traits.locale_text: "Да... если их не затронула скверна. Надеюсь, когда ты будешь решать судьбу этого мира и его обитателей, ты задумаешься о том, что среди этих несчастных есть и те, кто избежал касания Хаоса".

languages.text: "Yes... if they have not been touched by corruption. I hope that when you come to decide the fate of this world and its inhabitants, you consider the fact that these unfortunates also include those who have not been touched by Chaos."
languages.original_text: "Да... если их не затронула скверна. Надеюсь, когда ты будешь решать судьбу этого мира и его обитателей, ты задумаешься о том, что среди этих несчастных есть и те, кто избежал касания Хаоса".

traits.locale_text: "Yes... if they have not been touched by corruption. I hope that when you come to decide the fate of this world and its inhabitants, you consider the fact that these unfortunates also include those who have not been touched by Chaos."

"Yes... if they have not been touched by corruption. I hope that when you come to decide the fate of this world and its inhabitants, you consider the fact that these unfortunates also include those who have not been touched by Chaos."

"Yes... if they have not been touched by corruption. I hope that when you come to decide the fate of this world and its inhabitants, you consider the fact that these unfortunates also include those who have not been touched by Chaos."

"Yes... if they have not been touched by corruption. I hope that when you come to decide the fate of this world and its inhabitants, you consider the fact that these unfortunates also include those who have not been touched by Chaos."

languages.text: “是啊……如果他们还没有被腐化侵蚀的话。当你日后决定这个世界以及居民们的命运时，我希望你能考虑到这一点——这些可怜人之中，同样包括那些尚未被混沌触及的人。”
languages.original_text: "Yes... if they have not been touched by corruption. I hope that when you come to decide the fate of this world and its inhabitants, you consider the fact that these unfortunates also include those who have not been touched by Chaos."

traits.locale_text: “是啊……如果他们还没有被腐化侵蚀的话。当你日后决定这个世界以及居民们的命运时，我希望你能考虑到这一点——这些可怜人之中，同样包括那些尚未被混沌触及的人。”

languages.text: «Sí... siempre que la corrupción no los haya tocado. Espero que cuando decida el destino de este mundo y sus habitantes tenga en cuenta que entre estos desdichados hay gente inocente a la que el Caos no ha llegado a tocar».
languages.original_text: "Yes... if they have not been touched by corruption. I hope that when you come to decide the fate of this world and its inhabitants, you consider the fact that these unfortunates also include those who have not been touched by Chaos."

traits.locale_text: «Sí... siempre que la corrupción no los haya tocado. Espero que cuando decida el destino de este mundo y sus habitantes tenga en cuenta que entre estos desdichados hay gente inocente a la que el Caos no ha llegado a tocar».

languages.text: 「そうだ…彼らが腐敗に触れてさえいなければ。あなたがこの世界とその住民の運命を決めるとき、これらの不幸な人々に、渾沌に触れていない人々も含まれているという事実を考慮してくれることを願っている」
languages.original_text: "Yes... if they have not been touched by corruption. I hope that when you come to decide the fate of this world and its inhabitants, you consider the fact that these unfortunates also include those who have not been touched by Chaos."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ…彼らが腐敗に触れてさえいなければ。あなたがこの世界とその住民の運命を決めるとき、これらの不幸な人々に、渾沌に触れていない人々も含まれているという事実を考慮してくれることを願っている」

languages.text: "Ja ... falls sie nicht von der Korruption befallen wurden. Wenn Ihr über das Schicksal dieser Welt und ihrer Einwohner urteilt, werdet Ihr hoffentlich berücksichtigen, dass zu diesen Unglücklichen auch jene gehören, die vom Chaos unberührt geblieben sind."
languages.original_text: "Yes... if they have not been touched by corruption. I hope that when you come to decide the fate of this world and its inhabitants, you consider the fact that these unfortunates also include those who have not been touched by Chaos."

traits.locale_text: "Ja ... falls sie nicht von der Korruption befallen wurden. Wenn Ihr über das Schicksal dieser Welt und ihrer Einwohner urteilt, werdet Ihr hoffentlich berücksichtigen, dass zu diesen Unglücklichen auch jene gehören, die vom Chaos unberührt geblieben sind."

languages.text: « Oui... à condition que la corruption les ait épargnés. Lorsque vous déciderez du sort de ce monde et de ses habitants, j'espère vous garderez à l'esprit que ces malheureux n'ont pas tous été touchés par le Chaos. »
languages.original_text: "Yes... if they have not been touched by corruption. I hope that when you come to decide the fate of this world and its inhabitants, you consider the fact that these unfortunates also include those who have not been touched by Chaos."

traits.locale_text: « Oui... à condition que la corruption les ait épargnés. Lorsque vous déciderez du sort de ce monde et de ses habitants, j'espère vous garderez à l'esprit que ces malheureux n'ont pas tous été touchés par le Chaos. »

languages.text: "Evet... Tabii yozlaşmaya yenik düşmedilerse. Bu dünyanın ve onun sakinlerinin kaderini çizerken umarım bu talihsizlerin arasında Kaos'a değmemiş olanların da bulunduğunu unutmazsın."
languages.original_text: "Yes... if they have not been touched by corruption. I hope that when you come to decide the fate of this world and its inhabitants, you consider the fact that these unfortunates also include those who have not been touched by Chaos."

traits.locale_text: "Evet... Tabii yozlaşmaya yenik düşmedilerse. Bu dünyanın ve onun sakinlerinin kaderini çizerken umarım bu talihsizlerin arasında Kaos'a değmemiş olanların da bulunduğunu unutmazsın."
